programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Two days after D-Day, Easy Company is ordered to take the town of Carentan, a battle that results in casualties despite its apparent success. The battalion is finally sent to England after 36 days in Normandy, but the respite proves short-lived as the orders come to move out again

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: After a string of heavy casualties, a group of inexperienced paratroopers joins Easy Company in time for the massive Operation Market Garden. Aimed at invading Germany via Holland, the mission goes well until a combined force of American troops and British tanks runs into superior German opposition

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Bayliss is still having nightmares about his first murder case, so Gee is reluctant to assign the case of another girl murdered in 1932 to him

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part one of two. Pembleton and Bayliss investigate the murder of a prominent judge connected to the Mahoney organisation. Junior Bunk is brought in for questioning, but the team are surprised by his cavalier attitude

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Sansa grows in confidence under the watchful eye of the Machiavellian Lord Baelish, while Tyrion is after his just reward for the part he played in the Battle of the Blackwater. In the far North, Jon Snow is brought before formidable wildling leader Mance Rayder (Ciaran Hinds) and attempts to earn the trust of the King-beyond-the-Wall. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys Targaryen arrives in Slavers Bay with adviser Ser Jorah Mormont looking to form an army. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Shae sneaks into Tyrions chamber to tell him Ros warned her about Baelishs interest in Sansa, who goes to tea with Margaery and her grandmother Lady Olenna and is encouraged to speak freely about Joffrey. Jaime passes the time by taunting his escort Brienne, Arya encounters outlaw group the Brotherhood Without Banners, while Lord Karstark makes Robb aware he no longer has faith in him. Fantasy drama, guest starring Diana Rigg

programme.title: All Her Fault
programme.desc: Marissa Irvine arrives to collect her young son Milo from his first playdate, but the woman who answers the door isnt a mother she recognises, doesnt have Milo and has never heard of him. Mystery thriller based on the book by Andrea Mara, starring Sarah Snook, with Jake Lacy, Dakota Fanning and Michael Peña

programme.title: The Undoing
programme.desc: Grace Frasers seemingly perfect life is rocked by a violent death and the disappearance of her husband. Drama based on Jean Hanff Korelitzs novel, You Should Have Known, starring Hugh Grant and Nicole Kidman

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: A comatose Tony dreams about being a businessman on a trip marred by mistaken identities, while Carmela and Meadow hold a vigil at his hospital bedside. Silvio takes charge of things at Eugenes funeral in his bosss absence, and Junior is questioned over the shooting

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Mickey is forced to make the ultimate choice between his family or the woman he loves. Meanwhile, Genny starts to doubt his decision. In Italian

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: The time comes for everyone to make some big decisions. Who will be left to rule Napless smouldering ruins? In Italian

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion assumes new responsibilities, Jon is taken to the imposing Fist of the First Men, and Jaime strikes a deal with his captors. Meanwhile, Daenerys meets with the slavers as she moves to build an army. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
programme.desc: The men of the Nights Watch become increasingly hostile to Craster, and Arya is brought before the commander of the Brotherhood Without Banners. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys takes charge of her army of the Unsullied, while in Kings Landing, Cersei tells her father that Margaery is manipulating Joffrey, and Varys meets his match when he talks to Lady Olenna. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Maisie Williams, Conleth Hill and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Liverpool, cutting through cliches about football and the Beatles to explore its less-celebrated treasures. Among his destinations are a 1930s banking building that has remained unaltered since closing in 2007, a well-appointed set of toilets and a recording studio hidden in a bar. He also discovers which former dictator once spent Christmas in the city

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming discovers more little-known facts on a journey between Smithfields and Spitalfields, two of Londons most famous markets. He begins with a fry-up breakfast before visiting the remains of a Roman amphitheatre and investigating a mysterious secret in a Liverpool Street hotel, as well as meeting former EastEnders star Larry Lamb (Archie Mitchell)

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming discovers more little-known facts on a journey between Smithfields and Spitalfields, two of Londons most famous markets. He begins with a fry-up breakfast before visiting the remains of a Roman amphitheatre and investigating a mysterious secret in a Liverpool Street hotel, as well as meeting former EastEnders star Larry Lamb (Archie Mitchell)

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores Newcastle, discovering strange sounds by the river and finding out how traditional culture is being reinterpreted in the Byker district. He goes behind the scenes at Newcastle United with local football hero Peter Beardsley, learns about the history of adult comic Viz from former editor Simon Donald and accompanies comedienne Sarah Millican to her favourite part of the city

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads across the Irish Sea to Dublin, where he succumbs to the citys famous charm and meets some of its most fascinating characters. On a journey that takes in an 18th-century pleasure house and a burlesque life-painting class, Alan also stops off in Temple Bar for a pint with singer Sharon Corr, unlocks a mystery in Irelands oldest library and uncovers a stylish secret that lurks behind the steel shutters of an old lock-up

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Glasgow, one of his favourite cities, to reveal unusual and often hidden sights and sounds overlooked by the public. Starting at the Necropolis, he travels to the worlds oldest music hall before enjoying the views from a city-centre landmark. He also finds the time to take tea with a film star

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The fate of Jon Snow is revealed, Ramsay sends his dogs after Theon and Sansa, while Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their move

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven, while in the north of Westeros at Castle Black, the Nights Watch stands behind Alliser Thorne. Fantasy drama, starring Isaac Hempstead-Wright and Owen Teale

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: While Daenerys meets her future, Bran meets the past. Elsewhere, Tommen confronts the High Sparrow, and Arya continues her training. Starring Emilia Clarke, Maisie Williams and Isaac Hempstead-Wright

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The fantasy drama continues as Tyrion strikes a deal, while Jorah and Daario undertake a difficult task as they seek to catch up with Daenerys. Back across the Narrow Sea, Jaime and Cersei try to improve their situation. Starring Peter Dinklage, Iain Glen, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lena Headey

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions agenda in Slavers Bay sees him seeking a new, strange ally. In the North, Brienne goes on a mission, while in Braavos, Arya is given a chance to prove herself. Beyond the Wall, Bran makes progress with his mystical tuition, learning a great deal in the process. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Gwendoline Christie, Maisie Williams and Isaac Hempstead Wright

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: An old foe returns to the great game, and Arya faces a difficult choice. Meanwhile, Gilly is given a chance to discover whether Lord Randyll Tarly lives up to his formidable reputation as she meets Sams family, and Jaime puts himself at odds with the Faith Militant as he faces off with the High Sparrow. Fantasy drama, starring Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, John Bradley, Hannah Murray and Maisie Williams

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The High Sparrow eyes another target, Jaime confronts a hero, and Olenna Tyrell plans to leave Kings Landing. Meanwhile, Arya makes a plan

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: As Jaime weighs up his options, Cersei answers a request, and Tyrions plans bear fruit. Starring Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: As the Starks prepare to fight, Davos loses something dear, while Ramsay plays a game and Daenerys faces a choice

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: As Cersei awaits judgement, Walder Frey and Jaime celebrate at Riverrun. Meanwhile, winter finally arrives. Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke star

programme.title: The Iris Affair
programme.desc: Devastated by a setback, Iris makes a stand, while Camerons benefactor steps up control of his project

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Madeline gets under Renatas skin in retaliation for snubbing Ziggy, while Celeste and Perry see a counsellor, and Jane opens up about her past

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: After joining Leroy at their new house in Derry, Charlotte is left with a strange feeling while running errands in town, and Will is teased on his first day of school. Later, Lilly faces pressure from all sides about what really happened at the cinema and Ronnie worries about her fathers fate

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony books into the Plaza Hotel for a little peace and quiet, but his dreams are haunted by faces from the past. Meanwhile, Johnny Sacks bid for power claims another casualty, and Tony Blundetto resolves to exact revenge. Annette Bening guest stars, and the episode features appearances from former stars of the show, including Annabella Sciorra and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Adriana is forced to tell Christopher about her dealings with the FBI, and pleads with him to join her in the witness protection programme. However, the prospect of leading a normal life proves daunting to him. Tony settles his dispute with Carmela and moves back into the family home, but Johnny Sack has an ultimatum for him - if the gang war is to end, Tony Blundetto has to die

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony realises it will take desperate measures to keep the peace with Johnny Sack, with fatal consequences for one of the family. Carmela worries about her sons future, Christopher comes up with a story to cover Adrianas disappearance, and a visit from the FBI throws the Soprano organisation into upheaval

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony receives a retirement request from one of his associates, and decides to share his recent windfall with Carmela. Later, he is taken on a backyard treasure hunt by Junior, while Hesh seeks revenge against a wrongdoing involving his son-in-law. Starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming discovers more little-known facts on a journey between Smithfields and Spitalfields, two of Londons most famous markets. He begins with a fry-up breakfast before visiting the remains of a Roman amphitheatre and investigating a mysterious secret in a Liverpool Street hotel, as well as meeting former EastEnders star Larry Lamb (Archie Mitchell)

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bays sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The heroic autobots discover that a spaceship from their own planet crashed into the moon decades ago, carrying their former leader and an incredibly powerful device. They must fight to defend the human race as their enemies the decepticons plot to use this machine to rebuild their own world and destroy the Earth. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Shia LaBeouf, Josh Duhamel and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots are driven into hiding when the human race turns against them. When rediscovered by a kindly inventor and his daughter, they come out of exile to save the world, battling a new breed of human-created Transformers. These deadly new machines were created to hunt them down, but are now growing independent and intend to make use of technology from the Transformers home planet in a plot that could threaten all life on Earth. Fourth film in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Mark Wahlberg, Stanley Tucci and Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots and their human allies face a confrontation with their original creator, who has brainwashed their leader and intends to save her own home planet by destroying Earth. To save the human race they must recover an ancient artefact from Arthurian legend - but their mission is threatened by old enemies as they uncover a terrible secret about the history of the world. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Mark Wahlberg, Anthony Hopkins, Gemma Chan, Stanley Tucci and John Turturro

Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Chris Hemsworth, Brian Tyree Henry, Scarlett Johansson and Keegan-Michael Key

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash traps The Flash in a time loop so he is forced to relive the same day

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!
programme.desc: The bungling leader of a band of inept buccaneers is determined to prove his worth to his rivals and win the coveted Pirate of the Year award. An encounter with the naturalist Charles Darwin gives him the chance to pull off a daring crime - if he can survive coming face to face with the pirate-hating Queen Victoria. Animated comedy, with the voices of Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Imelda Staunton and David Tennant

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: In a world of living ideograms, multi-expressional emoji Gene embarks on a daring mission to find notorious hacker Jailbreak. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of TJ Miller, James Corden and Patrick Stewart

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of childrens books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be a life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Anti-social ogre Shrek resolves to stop an evil ruler from banishing fairy-tale characters to his swampland home. However, the reluctant hero ends up forced to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona from a castle guarded by a dragon, aided only by a wisecracking donkey. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A clumsy Viking boy longs to become a mighty dragon slayer and protect his village from the fearsome flying lizards, but his father thinks he is not up to the task. However, when he sets out to prove his worth, he ends up befriending a dragon, and realises his people may have misjudged the creatures. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Jay Baruchel and Gerard Butler

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A youngster believes his baby brother is actually a power-hungry tycoon sent to destroy his perfect family life. However, the duo must put aside their differences and work together when they uncover a plot to sabotage the company their parents work for. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Jimmy Kimmel and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!

Animated comedy, with the voices of Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Imelda Staunton and David Tennant

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs Mutants
programme.desc: The Dark Knight battles old enemies who have been transformed into giant monsters. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Oded Fehr

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks anniversary celebrations are thwarted by an evil sorcerer searching for a magical orb hidden deep inside their castle. When Derek is lured out of the palace to rescue his kidnapped mother, Odette calls on her band of animal friends for help. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson and Christy Landers

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Following a shipwreck, a robot called Roz survives on an uninhabited island with the help of wild animals. Family animation, with the voices of Lupita Nyongo, Pedro Pascal, Kit Connor and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: The grouchy ogre and his new wife Princess Fiona set out on a journey to meet her parents. However, the king and queen are less than impressed with their daughters choice of husband, while a conniving fairy godmother is determined to make sure her own son gets to marry the princess. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy, Antonio Banderas, John Cleese, Julie Andrews, Jennifer Saunders and Rupert Everett

Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A silver dragon named Firedrake and his friends search for a mythical safe haven hidden in the Himalayas. Animated family adventure based on the novel by Cornelia Funke, featuring the voices of Felicity Jones, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Patrick Stewart and Freddie Highmore

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A prince and princess have been expected to marry each other all their lives, a prospect they dreaded as children but which they came to look forward to as adults. However, an evil wizard captures the princess and turns her into a swan. Everyone else believes she is dead, but her betrothed sets out to bring her home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Jack Palance and John Cleese

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The dark knight joins forces with a team of superheroes including Green Arrow and The Flash to battle the mastermind behind a horse of deadly robotic animals. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Chris Diamantopoulos

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Under heavy pressure from her father, Beca reluctantly starts her first year at Barden University and gets an internship at the school radio station. She soon acquires a new circle of friends in the form of a band of misfits with a shared talent for singing, joining their a cappella group and trying to inject some much needed energy into their repertoire. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Brittany Snow, Anna Camp, Rebel Wilson and Skylar Astin

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: A Cappella group the Barden Bellas enjoy an unprecedented run of success, until a disastrous performance sees them banned from national competitions and beset by scandal. They attempt to turn their fortunes around and redeem their reputation by competing in the World Championships of A Cappella in Copenhagen. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas (an all-female a cappella singing group) reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour. However, they face a squad who uses both instruments and voices. Final part of the blockbusting comedy trilogy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Under heavy pressure from her father, Beca reluctantly starts her first year at Barden University and gets an internship at the school radio station. She soon acquires a new circle of friends in the form of a band of misfits with a shared talent for singing, joining their a cappella group and trying to inject some much needed energy into their repertoire. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Brittany Snow, Anna Camp, Rebel Wilson and Skylar Astin

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: A Cappella group the Barden Bellas enjoy an unprecedented run of success, until a disastrous performance sees them banned from national competitions and beset by scandal. They attempt to turn their fortunes around and redeem their reputation by competing in the World Championships of A Cappella in Copenhagen. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson

Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Brittany Snow, Anna Camp, Rebel Wilson and Skylar Astin

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends, the Hoods, the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom. However, when the slippery property developer Clipboard dazzles the parents of the area with promises of health spas and day-care facilities, the gang risk losing their kingdom forever. Director Phil Hawkins comedy, starring Naomie Harris, Darcey Ewart, Gwendoline Christie and Mark Williams

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent retires to a Tibetan monastery in disgrace after a mission goes wrong. He is lured out of seclusion by the chance to redeem himself when his former bosses seek his help in foiling an attempt to assassinate the premier of China. Spy comedy sequel, starring Rowan Atkinson, Gillian Anderson, Rosamund Pike and Dominic West

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: Musical based on The Wizard of Oz, featuring an all-black cast. Dorothy is suddenly whisked off to a magical land and makes some unusual friends as she tries to get back home, while avoiding the malevolent attentions of a wicked witch. Directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Diana Ross, Michael Jackson and Richard Pryor

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, with Neil Patrick Harris, Hank Azaria and Jayma Mays, plus voices of Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures and their human friends go on a rescue mission to Paris. Their old foe Gargamel the evil wizard has created mischievous smurfs of his own and kidnapped Smurfette to learn the secret of her magic. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Hank Azaria and Neil Patrick Harris, with the voices of Katy Perry and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Penniless Charlie Bucket is one of five lucky children who find a golden ticket in a chocolate bar, winning a once-in-a-lifetime tour of eccentric recluse Willy Wonkas magical sweet company. Unfortunately, the other winners each face a grim fate when they start to misbehave. Tim Burtons childrens fantasy, based on Roald Dahls novel, starring Johnny Depp, Freddie Highmore, Helena Bonham Carter, and Deep Roy playing all the Oompa Loompas

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: British wizard Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York City with a bagful of magical creatures as part of a global study of fantastic beasts, but gets caught up in a conflict when some of the creatures in his care are accidentally released after an inadvertent switching of suitcases with a baker. With a strange, dark force terrorising the Big Apple, Newt needs to find some allies to help him round up the beasts, while saving his own skin in the meantime. Harry Potter prequel written for the screen by JK Rowling, starring Eddie Redmayne, with Katherine Waterston, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton, Jon Voight, Dan Fogler and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Pregnant Mollie is dumped by her boyfriend, and sets out after the babys birth to find a surrogate father for her infant son Mikey, who comments on proceedings through a wisecracking inner monologue. Mikey is confident the cab driver who helped deliver him is the perfect man for the job - but his mother is less than convinced. Comedy, with John Travolta, Kirstie Alley and the voice of Bruce Willis

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Breaking Point
programme.desc: Two adopted brothers are estranged after the loss of their mother. However, united in their love of breakdancing, they attempt to win the World Breaking Championship. Drama, starring Karam Singh, Kelvin Clarke and Hannah John-Kamen

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A fisherman finds a friend in a lost penguin, and after taking the bird under his wing, he finds a new sense of joy. Director David Schurmanns drama inspired by a true story, starring Jean Reno and Adriana Barraza

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them

With a strange, dark force terrorising the Big Apple, Newt needs to find some allies to help him round up the beasts, while saving his own skin in the meantime. Harry Potter prequel written for the screen by JK Rowling, starring Eddie Redmayne, with Katherine Waterston, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton, Jon Voight, Dan Fogler and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: An American couple decide their son needs a brother, and plan to adopt another child - but when they get to the orphanage they are greeted by a charming talking mouse named Stuart, who fits the bill perfectly. However, their jealous cat hatches a plot to get rid of the new arrival. Comedy adventure, starring Geena Davis and Hugh Laurie, with the voice of Michael J Fox

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: The plucky talking mouse feels left out when the son of his adopted human family makes a new pal - but quickly forgets such trifling matters when his high-flying canary friend is captured by an evil falcon, prompting the brave rodent to mount a daring rescue. Family adventure sequel, with Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie and Jonathan Lipnicki, and the voices of Michael J Fox, Melanie Griffith and James Woods

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: A megalomaniac threatens to take over the world, so two married spies come out of retirement to thwart his plans. However, when they go missing, it is up to their plucky children to step in and save the day. Family adventure directed by Robert Rodriguez, starring Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino, Alan Cumming, Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Too
programme.desc: Wisecracking toddler Mikey is joined by mischievous baby sister Julie and sibling rivalry inevitably erupts - while their parents have problems of their own to deal with, in the shape of the kids good-for-nothing uncle. Comedy sequel, starring John Travolta and Kirstie Alley, with the voices of Bruce Willis and Rosanne Barr

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: In a fantasy world where a fairy godmother endows each newborn with a special attribute, baby Ella is given the unwelcome gift of obedience. While growing up, she is magically compelled to do anything she is told to, and her stepmother takes great delight in forcing the girl to obey her every whim. So Ella sets out on a quest to find her fairy godmother and get her to take back her unwanted birthright. Fantasy adventure, starring Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Minnie Driver and Joanna Lumley

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter intervenes when a man and his family are threatened by a predatory cattle baron determined to force every homesteader in the valley off the land. The situation rapidly escalates into violence, while an unspoken attraction develops between the gunman and the settlers wife. Western, starring Alan Ladd, Jack Palance, Van Heflin and Jean Arthur. Based on the novel by Jack Schaefer

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald OConnor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: A former 10-pin bowling champion prodigy turns conman and hits the bottle when an accident leads to the loss of his hand. To revive his flagging fortunes, he goes all out to persuade a gifted Amish man to take up the sport professionally so he can cash in on his prize-winnings. Comedy from the Farrelly brothers, starring Woody Harrelson, Randy Quaid, Vanessa Angel and Bill Murray

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: An obnoxious TV weatherman reporting on a small towns annual festival finds himself caught in a bizarre time loop, and is forced to relive the same day over and over again. While at first he tries to exploit his predicament, he is ultimately driven to mend his ways and adopt a less cynical attitude. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott and Stephen Tobolowsky

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: A writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubricks horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin OBrien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning actor announces on national TV that his former schoolteacher is gay, causing uproar in the close-knit community where he grew up, and forcing the beleaguered tutor to convince his family, fiancee and pupils that he is straight. Comedy, starring Kevin Kline, Matt Dillon, Tom Selleck and Joan Cusack

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Two billionaire brothers engineer the downfall of a high-flying stockbroker, while giving a homeless conman all the advantages of wealth, as part of a bet to see whether heredity or upbringing determines character. Comedy, starring Dan Aykroyd, Eddie Murphy, Jamie Lee Curtis, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Two billionaire brothers engineer the downfall of a high-flying stockbroker, while giving a homeless conman all the advantages of wealth, as part of a bet to see whether heredity or upbringing determines character. Comedy, starring Dan Aykroyd, Eddie Murphy, Jamie Lee Curtis, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enter a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmothers house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: Through a Glass Darkly
programme.desc: A former mental institution inmate returns to her family, but faces an uphill struggle to readjust to life in the outside world. Ingmar Bergmans drama, starring Harriet Andersson and Max von Sydow. In Swedish

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: A science teachers life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town. Sci-fi comedy drama, starring Brandon Routh, Mena Suvari and Malina Pauli Weissman

programme.title: Christmas on Duty
programme.desc: Former army rivals Blair and Josh must work Christmas duty together. When a snowstorm threatens holiday deliveries to the base, theyre forced to cooperate to save Christmas, despite their past conflicts. Romantic drama, starring Janel Parrish and Parker Young

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: A strangers claim that a couples 15-year-old daughter was switched at birth throws their perfect family into turmoil, unearthing shattering secrets. Drama, starring Sophia Bush, Chris Carmack and Amiah Miller

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Christmas on Duty
programme.desc: Former army rivals Blair and Josh must work Christmas duty together. When a snowstorm threatens holiday deliveries to the base, theyre forced to cooperate to save Christmas, despite their past conflicts. Romantic drama, starring Janel Parrish and Parker Young

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Inside a rural farmhouse, painter Ramona Harris recuperates with a leg brace following a head-on car collision that claimed the life of her husband. Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When a spy is suspected of treason, her husband faces the ultimate test - loyalty to his marriage or his country. Director Steven Soderberghs thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Cate Blanchett and Rege-Jean Page

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard

Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Christmas on Duty
programme.desc: Former army rivals Blair and Josh must work Christmas duty together. When a snowstorm threatens holiday deliveries to the base, theyre forced to cooperate to save Christmas, despite their past conflicts. Romantic drama, starring Janel Parrish and Parker Young

programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Inside a rural farmhouse, painter Ramona Harris recuperates with a leg brace following a head-on car collision that claimed the life of her husband. Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: Due to the pandemic, Parker and her best friend decide to quarantine at the family lake house alone - or so they think. Horror, starring Gideon Adlon, Bethlehem Million and Dylan Spradberry

programme.title: The Secret of Marrowbone
programme.desc: A young man and his three siblings have kept the death of their beloved mother secret in order to remain together. However, they are plagued by a sinister presence in their sprawling manor. Writer/director Sergio G Sanchezs horror, starring George MacKay, Anya Taylor-Joy and Charlie Heaton

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: An American family fulfil their dream of moving back to Norway after inheriting a cabin in the mountains, but soon encounter dark forces. Festive comedy horror, starring Martin Starr, Amrita Acharia and Kiran Shah

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As his behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: Pop sensation Skye Riley faces increasingly terrifying events, leading her down a dark path into her past. Writer/director Parker Finns horror sequel, starring Naomi Scott, Kyle Gallner and Drew Barrymore

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Residents of a small Pennsylvania town are disturbed when a UFO crashes into a back garden. Director Marc Turtletaubs comedy drama, starring Ben Kingsley, Harriet Harris and Jane Curtin

programme.title: Sick

programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: A courier transports information in a microchip in his brain. On his latest assignment, he is pursued by various criminal, militant and corporate factions who will kill to get the data - and he only has 24 hours to deliver it before it destroys his mind. Sci-fi thriller based on a William Gibson short story, starring Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren and Ice-T

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely woman allows a group of teenagers to throw a party in her basement, provided they follow some simple rules - one of which is to always call her Ma. Over the course of the night, their kindly host shows a far more sinster side to her nature - and her young guests find themselves trapped in a nightmare. Horror, starring Octavia Spencer and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: A woman and her friends survive a plane crash, but discover something more dangerous lurking in the shallows of the Louisiana everglades. Horror thriller, starring Athena Strates and Madalena Aragao

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In central Europe during 2041, a female detective investigates the case of a slain couple where a restoration team is able to bring one of them back to life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Andrea Mohylova, Matej Hádek and Milan Ondrík

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After African American photographer Chris and his white girlfriend Rose visit her wealthy parents, he suspects theres more to the locals than meets the eye. Oscar-winning psychological thriller written and directed by Jordan Peele (Us), starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: During a day trip to watch a theatre performance, terminally ill cancer patient Sam witnesses Earths terrifying first contact with the Death Angels - sightless creatures, which hunt by sound. Calmly resigned to her demise, she embarks on a lonely trek to Harlem to enjoy a final slice of pizza from the restaurant where her late father took her as a child. Horror prequel, starring Lupita Nyongo, Joseph Quinn and Alex Wolff

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killers enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. Thriller, starring Shailene Woodley, Ben Mendelsohn and Ralph Ineson

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss stops off at an isolated motel, where the disturbed owners curious relationship with his domineering mother leads to murder. Director Gus Van Sants scene-by-scene remake of Alfred Hitchcocks thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Anne Heche, Julianne Moore, Viggo Mortensen and William H Macy.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegass biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderberghs crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patients fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalans thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince an Irish gypsy to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchies comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctors deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avengers trap. Ridley Scotts thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta

Francis Ford Coppolas gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals
programme.sub-title: From the Seas to the Skies
programme.desc: Part one of two. The naturalist explores the evolution of vertebrates over the past 500 million years, beginning with a look at how remarkable advances allowed primitive fish to make the radical move on to land, and then take to the skies with the advent of flight. He uses fossils of both ancient and living species combined with CGI and film to chart their journey out of the water to populate all corners of the globe

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals

programme.title: Border Force: Americas Gatekeepers

programme.title: Border Force: Americas Gatekeepers
programme.desc: A man kidnapped and beaten by a Mexican drug cartel flees across the bridge into America. At Progreso International Bridge, a woman is caught hiding anti-anxiety pills in her bra

programme.title: Special Ops: Crime Squad UK
programme.desc: The National Crime Agency - Britains answer to the FBI - tackle a people-smuggling ring, a Ghanaian cocaine smuggling operation, and organised online romance fraud

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a project to build a car that can turn into a hovercraft and bring relief to flooded areas. Their efforts do not start smoothly, but it is not long before the trio are demonstrating the brilliance of their creation with an eventful journey down the River Avon. Plus, Jeremy grabs the keys to two variants of the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG supercar - the V8-engined Black Series with a roaring 622bhp, and the 740bhp Electric Drive, which is powered by four electric motors. X-Men and Les Miserables star Hugh Jackman is the latest celebrity to take the new Reasonably Priced Car around the test track

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May take a look at increasingly popular tall hatchbacks known as crossovers. Having concluded their primary appeal is to caravanners, the duo spend a couple of days in models by Mazda and Volkswagen and try to get a feel for what life is like for the people they believe would buy one. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond drives a pair of exciting Lamborghinis in Italy - the ferocious Aventador Roadster and the limited-edition Sesto Elemento, which carries an eye-watering price tag of around £2million. programme.title: Gavin and Stacey

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: The team helps a couple whose 24-year-old son Ryan has been living in hospital for the last five years, as they renovate the downstairs of their three-bedroom house in Bristol so he can move back home. The house needs a downstairs extension with all the bespoke care provision that Ryan will need, including physio space, a wet-room, a family area and the ability to access the entire ground floor, and if the family doesnt get this work done, Ryan will remain in hospital 50 miles away

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: The building crusaders come to the aid of 12-year-old Matthew from Telford, Shropshire, who has been stuck in hospital for three years after suffering cancer and a stroke. The youngsters head teacher and school friends have been fundraising to get him home, so now, Nick Knowles and the team - with the help of hundreds of volunteers - set out to make Matthews home suitable for his complex medical needs

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: As part of the 2013 appeal, Nick Knowles and the team head to Peterborough to help Children in Need-funded organisation Little Miracles, which supports youngsters with disabilities and life-limiting illnesses and their families. However, whereas Mark, Chris, Julian and Billy normally renovate an existing property, for the first time they are knocking down a building and reconstructing it from the ground up - making it worth almost £1million. With just nine days to complete the job, theyll need help - and lots of it. Luckily, tradespeople turn out in force - from both the local area and across the country - giving their time for free

programme.title: MasterChef Australia: Dessert Masters
programme.desc: The finalists create a two-course meal inspired by green and gold, but only one chef will impress the judges enough to become the new Dessert Master

programme.title: Simply Nigella
programme.desc: Food writer Nigella Lawson examines how different days require certain types of food, sharing her favourite menu to help get that balance right in the kitchen. She prepares a light salad of salmon, avocado, watercress and pumpkin seeds, and a chicken shawarma with an array of spices, sauces and flatbreads - a dish inspired by a spit-roasted Lebanese kebab that is perfect for feeding a crowd. Nigella also creates two sweet treats, a glossy liquorice and blackcurrant chocolate cake, and chocolate chip cookie dough pots served with ice-cream or creme fraiche

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The work of NHS emergency response teams. Staff are scrambled to a block of flats after an explosion causes multiple casualties and a driver is trapped after his lorry hits a tree

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The team joins the search for a missing aeroplane pilot and passenger. A man digging for antique bottles in a South Yorkshire tip is buried alive, leading to a desperate fight to save him

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Edina rubs shoulders with the stars at a prestigious PR bash she has funded in the hope of bagging a few awards - but what she does not know is that arch-rival Claudia Bing has other ideas. Daughter Saffy, meanwhile, lines up a few extra-curricular activities with her psychology lecturer. Guest starring Naomi Campbell and Celia Imrie

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Edinas daughter Saffy flies the nest, so Patsy promptly takes her place in the Monsoon household - but the strain of living together soon proves too much for the fashion-crazed friends. Starring Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, with a guest appearance by Lulu

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Mother ends up home alone when Edina goes away to discover herself at a retreat, Saffy moves out, and Patsy gets a job in New York. Comedy, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and June Whitfield

programme.title: DNA Family Secrets
programme.desc: Four more people test their DNA to help answer life-changing questions, including Clare, who wonders whether her Dad was a British soldier during the Troubles. Leigh only discovered that he might have a secret sister after his mum passed away, while it was only when Jenna and Ryan were pregnant that they realised they both carry a genetic mutation that could be deadly if passed on to their kids

programme.title: Simply Nigella
programme.desc: Food writer Nigella Lawson rustles up more of her favourite recipes, this time with the emphasis on cosy and comforting mood. For breakfast she makes a tray of dairy-free chai muffins and theres a low-key lunch of Asian-flavoured short ribs - a perfect make-ahead, tender beef stew. Inspired by her visits to Americas west coast, an informal supper for friends features Nigellas home-made, oven-baked fish tacos, which involve a bit of DIY at the table, followed by a salted chocolate tart for pudding

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Sam investigates the background of an eastern European diplomat accused of a violent assault on a prostitute and learns he could be a murderer. The pressure is on when it emerges the suspect has full diplomatic immunity and is due to be deported within 24 hours. Phil and Grace interview a painter, whose valuable nude portrait of an ex-lover has been stolen. Leela accepts a post outside Sun Hill, unaware a colleague has pulled strings to ease her departure

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Stuart works fast to find the children of separated parents when CCTV footage shows the brother and sister talking to a known paedophile. New recruit PC Benjamin Gayle is teamed with Will to investigate an assault on a Polish building worker and finds himself in a tight spot when the victims colleagues cut up rough about his fish-poaching activities on the common. Micah Balfour stars

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Stuart impresses his Sun Hill colleagues as he makes his debut on TV crime show Wanted, hoping to clear up a burglary case during which the victim, lawyer Ian Stroud, suffered a massive heart attack. The public response is overwhelming, leaving the team to pick through a mountain of false leads - including a sighting of a man once defended in court by Stroud who served eight years for a rape he did not commit

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A badly beaten woman found in possession of a bag full of passports claims to be an asylum seeker whose political activist husband was murdered in Zimbabwe. However, when her son is abducted, a completely different story emerges and the race is on to rescue the boy from a violent and vengeful father. Gina discovers a bank robber she believed had died in a bank vault blast years ago is alive and well - and back in the country. John Rogan and Nicky Henson guest star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Mickey kisses Sally - strictly in the course of his duties - as they trail bank robber Vince Murray to find out what hes up to back in England. Meanwhile, the old lags son Darren proves to be a chip off the old block, staging a burglary with Ian Forrests lad Kieran, but its news to the youngsters that Ian was killed in the bank vault explosion while Vince survived the blast. Guest starring Nicky Henson and John Rogan

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: Join ambulances, helicopters and boats across New Zealand, transporting critical patients to safety. Paramedics find a motocross rider near death in a remote forest

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: A man is at risk of losing his leg after a horrific accident with a boat propeller, while another needs to be airlifted to hospital after an accident involving a tractor

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: The Auckland Rescue Helicopter crew are dispatched to a critical situation when a drag racer smashes into a concrete wall

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: Four people are left fighting to keep their heads above water when their boat sinks in the Firth of Thames

programme.title: Pete Wicks: For Dogs Sake
programme.desc: Pete helps a withdrawn pregnant Malinois regain strength so she can care for her 11 lively pups, and falls for Winter, a Staffie who is covered in scars

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A small cavachon is rushed to see Professor Noel Fitzpatrick after being hit by a car. She has a broken leg, but also a serious heart condition. Meanwhile, Simba, a one-year-old Labrador needs help with her badly formed hips, and Tulee the nervous basset hound has diseased discs in her back that leave her in constant pain

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Beth and David, who met online on a Harry Potter website, arrive in the hospital awaiting the birth of their baby daughter. Meanwhile, 28-year-old Kathereen from Colombia and Birmingham-born Nick, whos 40, are in the maternity ward expecting their second child together, and couple Gavin and Carla arrive for the birth of their baby son

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Sharnee, whos 25, and 27-year-old Dan await the arrival of their first child together. Meanwhile, after seven years trying and two failed rounds of IVF, 33-year-old Jo and 47-year-old Pat arrive on the ward to be induced, and April, whos 27, is having her third baby, with support from her little sister Chloe

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: Its Sydneys annual City2Surf and paramedics drive through crowds to locate a semi-conscious participant with hyperthermia and a 70-year-old who collapsed after a 14km run

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: The ambulance helicopter crew rush to save a cyclist with serious head injuries, while paramedics scramble to deal with a spate of party drug overdoses on Sydneys Oxford Street

programme.title: DNA Family Secrets
programme.desc: Georgina was conceived during a holiday romance 34 years ago when her mother fell for a Portuguese waiter, and now, she wants to know if her father is still alive. Matthew grew up in foster care never knowing where his father came from, and he longs to discover the truth about his ancestry and if he is actually Caribbean

programme.title: Simply Nigella
programme.desc: Food writer Nigella Lawson examines how different days require certain types of food, sharing her favourite menu to help get that balance right in the kitchen. programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo visits Yosemite National Park in California, beholding its towering granite cliffs, giant sequoia trees and cascading waterfalls. He then heads to the University of Californias seismology department to hear about the devastating 1906 San Francisco earthquake, which claimed the lives of approximately 3,000 people and destroyed more than 80 per cent of the city

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues through southern California aboard the Coast Starlight rail service. In the port of Monterey, he discovers the citys Spanish and Mexican heritage, before heading to Paso de Robles, where he tours Hearst Castle, dream home of the newspaper baron, William Randolph Hearst. In the hills of Morro Bay, Michael joins avocado farmer, Jim Shanley, amid his 4,000 avocado trees to harvest the pears and learn how to make guacamole. Arriving in Los Angeles, Michael heads for the Warner Brothers studio, founded on Sunset Boulevard

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: There is a triple collection of desirable cars in store for Derek when an MG Midget, an Austin-Healey frogeye Sprite and an RS2000 come up for auction

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves son Jack heads to Cheshire to collect two cars with a 35-year age difference, and luckily for Mathewsons, Lucy knows exactly whats been brought in for auction

programme.title: Adolf Hitlers War
programme.desc: The Red Army develops strength and Hitlers Spring Offensive is stopped at Stalingrad; and in the largest ghetto the inhabitants fight back in the Warsaw Uprising

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: An account of Hitlers decision to invade the Soviet Union, which produced an initial series of dazzling victories until the harsh winter of 1941 took hold, with fatal consequences for the ill-equipped German army. Narrated by Laurence Olivier

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents as the team visits Brooklands motor racing museum, near Weybridge in Surrey, where the items valued include aboriginal tools, a bust found abandoned in a garden and an old chest that was given away on the internet. The experts also examine artefacts documenting attempts to break the world land speed record

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: More valuations from the motor racing museum at Brooklands, near Weybridge in Surrey. Items include a rare stirrup cup, a set of books once owned by Winston Churchill, and a bracelet given to Queen Victoria that was found in a gutter. Fiona Bruce also welcomes the return of an old friend of the programme

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dereks search for the unusual lands him a 1947 Lea-Francis thats half made of wood. Paul heads for the countryside to pick up a Morris one tonne truck

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave and Jack head to East Yorkshire to pick up a dusty Alfa Romeo and a 1930s Jowett. But Daves more taken with a Carry On-style, bum-wobbling exercise machine

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The adventurer reaches Sri Lanka, whose strategic location and tropical spices made it a target for invaders and colonisers for centuries. In the north he visits the scenes of vicious battles between the Tamil minority and the Sri Lankan army, traumatic events from which the population is still recovering. On his way to Bangladesh, he hitches a ride on a trawler, highlighting one of the Indian Oceans fastest-growing industries - providing prawns for the West. But as he reveals, it comes at a price for the environment

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age

Plus, a pilot blogs his own plane crash into the Pacific Ocean and a trip to the hair salon before Prom sees one girls dream haircut turning into a nightmare when a car crashes through the window

programme.title: I Married the Waiter: Love in the Sun
programme.desc: As summer tans lines start to fade, this documentary meets British women of all ages and backgrounds whose holiday romances endured long after they came home to the UK. Anne, Dawn and Jean all found love on the Greek island of Symi, Maddison, Fleur and Ruth fell for men they met in Turkey, and 70-year-old Dorothy married a 21-year-old Tunisian man. The programme looks at the culture clashes that have sometimes arisen in these relationships, and discovers that even though not all of the love stories have a happy ending, none of the women involved have any regrets about following their hearts. In fact, one of them was even able to use her experiences to launch a new career as a successful novelist

The pair hit it off immediately, leaving Paul to wonder whether he should rehome the canine himself. But there is bad news - Prince has a suspicious lump on his leg that requires urgent attention. Paul also meets Yorkshire terrier Dash, whose bark has lost its bite leaving him with a very unusual, squeaky voice. As if that were not bad enough, the little canine soon earns the nickname Dash the Slash after the comedian takes him out for a walk - and ends up with a wet leg

programme.title: Animal Emergency
programme.desc: Following the work of veterinary surgeons. In the first episode, a French bulldog arrives at the Vet Hospital for specialist spinal surgery to help him walk properly. Plus, staff in the large animal department have to decide if a wild seals eye is able to be saved, and nurse Clodagh and vet Myles have to look long and hard to find a magnet in a parrots gizzard

programme.desc: Clare native Vincent is attending the animal hospital with Porsche, his once speedy greyhound that he fears is on her last legs. Plus, Ed Sheeran chats and performs Camera, from his current album Play
